title: Four police teams searching for girl missing from Atulugama
body_lines: The police have deployed four teams in search of the nine-year-old girl reported missing from Atulugama area.
According to a senior police officer, the father of the missing girl is facing lengthy interrogations over the incident.
It is reported that the nine-year-old, a resident of Atulugama area, had gone missing since 10.00 a.m. on Friday (May 27).
